subject: Hockey, Ice
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Rangers grabbed two of the N.H.L.’s biggest free agents yesterday, the first day of the free-agent signing period, snatching center Scott Gomez from the Devils and center Chris Drury from Buffalo.
snippet: The Rangers grabbed two of the N.H.L.’s biggest free agents yesterday, the first day of the free-agent signing period, snatching center Scott Gomez from the Devils and center Chris Drury from Buffalo.
